name: Redbubble Profile
description: My Redbubble profile. You can purchase Apparel with my art on it.

name: Brasov
description: The first of my vectorizing photos from around the world. This one is from Brasov, Romania.

name: Falco Lombardi
description: Fan art done for one of my favorite video games, Super Smash Brothers.

name: All Might
description: The no.1 Hero in the series, My Hero Academia, is based off of Silver Age comic heroes

name: Cell
description: This design is a coat of arms for Cell, a main villain from the Dragon Ball series

description: Made after the release of the latest installment of the Pokemon series

name: Lunaala
description: Cross version counterpart to Solageo, Lunaala is also a Pokemon

name: Mewtwo
description: A powerful Pokemon, this design was one of the first added

name: Bowser
description: One of the earlier works in this collection, this is fanart of Bowser, the main antagonist from Mario

name: The Grinch
description: You're a mean one, Mr.Grinch! You do make for a nice design though

name: SSJ2 Gohan
description: Also from Dragon ball, this design depicts a major clash between two powerful characters
